base_description: Medium-sized rectangular cabinet, white with modern style.
part_description: The cabinet has one large door at the bottom, a smaller drawer above, and a handle on each. The door is rectangular, and the drawer is positioned horizontally at the top.
internal_interaction_description: The drawer slides in and out smoothly on metal tracks, providing easy access to its contents. The door swings open on hinges, revealing internal shelving for storage. The handles facilitate the opening and closing of both the door and the drawer.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or integrated into a kitchen or bathroom setup. It interacts with users by providing storage space and organizing items. The handles allow users to open and close the compartments easily, while the flat top can support additional objects.
